short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a summarised review of MakeMyTrip.com hotels using GPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find yourself scrolling to the bottom of the page to read all the customer reviews and make a decision whether to book the hotel?

Fermi is your AI assistant powered by OpenAI GPT-3 that reads all the customer reviews and gives you a summary at the very top of the page on MakeMyTrip!
